attributes.additional_details:
Because in the UK its still illegal to assist with dieing.
The government need to approve this and make it legal to die with Dignity
attributes.background: To legalise assistance with dieing with divinity to all those without quality of life and in pain and suffering.To provide those who are very ill ,end of life or illnesses with no treatments or cures to have the right to end their lives by being given a medication or injection to terminate life

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Hold a referendum on legalising Euthanasia in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630647
